name: api_video_VideoPlayer
description: Plays video content onto a target.

properties.name: aspectRatio
properties.description: Defines how the video content will be stretched to fill the target area.

properties.name: audioOutputMode
properties.description: Destination for the audio embedded in the video.

properties.name: audioTrackCount
properties.description: Number of audio tracks found in the data source currently configured. (Read Only)

properties.name: canSetDirectAudioVolume
properties.description: Whether direct-output volume controls are supported for the current platform and video format. (Read

properties.name: canSetPlaybackSpeed
properties.description: Whether you can change the playback speed. (Read Only)

properties.name: canSetSkipOnDrop
properties.description: Whether frame-skipping to maintain synchronization can be controlled. (Read Only)

properties.name: canSetTime
properties.description: Whether you can change the current time using the VideoPlayer.time or VideoPlayer.frame properties.

properties.name: canSetTimeUpdateMode
properties.description: Whether you can change the time source followed by the VideoPlayer. (Read Only)

properties.name: canStep
properties.description: Returns true if the VideoPlayer can step forward through the video content. (Read Only)

properties.name: clip
properties.description: The clip being played by the VideoPlayer.

properties.name: clockTime
properties.description: The clock time that the VideoPlayer follows to schedule its samples. The clock time is expressed in

properties.name: controlledAudioTrackCount
properties.description: Number of audio tracks that this VideoPlayer will take control of.

properties.name: externalReferenceTime
properties.description: Reference time of the external clock the VideoPlayer uses to correct its drift.

properties.name: frame
properties.description: The frame index of the currently available frame in VideoPlayer.texture.

properties.name: frameCount
properties.description: Number of frames in the current video content. (Read Only)

properties.name: frameRate
properties.description: The frame rate of the clip or URL in frames/second. (Read Only)

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the images in the VideoClip, or URL, in pixels. (Read Only)

properties.name: isLooping
properties.description: Determines whether the VideoPlayer restarts from the beginning when it reaches the end of the clip.

properties.name: isPaused
properties.description: Whether playback is paused. (Read Only)

properties.name: isPlaying
properties.description: Returns whether the VideoPlayer is currently playing the content.
